text: aur us vakt mujhe mere naphs ne yahee sujhaaya moosa ne kaha chal (door ho) tere lie (is duniya kee) zindagee mein to (ye saza hai) too kahata firega ki mujhe na chhoona (varana bukhaar chadh jaega) aur (aakhirat mein bhee) yaqeenee tere lie (azaab ka) vaayada hai ki haragiz tujhase khilaaf na kiya jaega aur too apane maabood ko to dekh jis (kee ibaadat) par too dat baitha tha ki ham use yaqeenan jalaakar (raakh) kar daalenge phir ham use titir bitir karake dariya mein uda degen
